name: @ai-chat/core
description: Core AI service wrappers, configuration, and utilities shared across AI Chat apps

scripts.build: tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist && swc src -d dist --strip-leading-paths && bun ../../scripts/resolve-path-aliases.mjs .
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.test:integration:prepare: bun run build && tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && bun ../../scripts/resolve-test-aliases.mjs .
scripts.test:all: bun run test:integration:prepare ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-openai.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-mistral.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-grok.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-gemini.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-anthropic.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-deepseek.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-qwen.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-kimi.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-zai.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-cohere.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-llama.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-nvidia.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-xiaomi.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-minimax.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-baidu.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-bytedance.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-huggingface.js ; bun dist-tests/tests/integration-ok-perplexity.js

author: AI Chat Team
